info: Created utility scripts [Python] to automatically compare remote databases over multiple frameworks [SQL Server, PostgreSQL, AWS Athena/S3,] flagging and visualizing discrepancies through generated tables.

Developed automated parsers [Python] to correctly format client-provided data into artifacts consumable by ETL Processes. This was done with 10 distinct, custom configurations corresponding to the many original forms of the client data.
Planned, Created, and Modified a Custom Data Visualization/Profiling application [Python] with a variety of libraries.

!Highlighted outliers and invalid records in client datasets from [AWS S3], based on client and industry standards: Implemented a prediction model to analyze past datasets to predict the profile of those in the future.
Collaborated with team members to efficiently provide high levels of customer service during high-demand influxes.
Performed periodic checks on inventory and equipment maintenance to ensure food safety.
Developed strategies and routines to ensure the cleanliness and security of the deli workspace at all times.
Led two separate design teams (Sep 22’ - Dec 22’ & Jan 23’ - Apr 23’) of other engineering students by employing sprint structure workflows, Gantt charts, and other project management strategies.
Developed unique strategies involving [Python, Excel] to generate solutions to client problems, with the assistance of a thorough understanding and research of the underlying client need.
Developed a fully-functional prototype with an interactive UI component using Arduino [C, C++] to present to the client and public; illustrating the team’s solution to their issue.
Developed leadership skills while regulating the development of a high school yearbook.
Ensured that the team met a client-imposed deadline by employing project management methods.
Leveraged three years of previous experience to assist incoming members in using the design software [Photoshop, Figma] - hosted in-person and online tutorials every other week.
Reviewed and edited the designs of other students to provide constructive feedback.
Took creative initiative when designing the yearbook.
